price: Jedhi: “Gooftaa kiyya! Ani hasaasaalee sheyxaanotaa irraa Sittin maganfadha!
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi aʿūdhu bika min hamazāti al-shayāṭīni
